page.title: 04HOUSING IN OTTERY
page.content:
There are a lot of different houses:- town houses, detached, semi detached, cottages, old houses and new houses. There are thatched cottages and farm houses. Some houses open on to pavements and some straight on to roads, most new houses have front gardens. Some walls are brick, some are rendered which is a kind of bobbly substance.
MY HOUSE My house is a semi detached house. It is the last number in Chineway Gardens, 139. It is made of brick and has no chimney. Inside there are 10 rooms altogether in the house 6 downstairs and 4 up. The downstairs rooms are a bedroom, shower room with shower, toilet and washbasin, dining room, sitting room, kitchen and conservatory. Upstairs there is a bath
